code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ToDoApp(props){const[inputText,setInputText]=useState('');const handlePress=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){props.addToDoList(inputText);setInputText('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center mb-5",children:"Todo App"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Add a new todo",onKeyDown:handlePress,value:inputText,onChange:e=>{setInputText(e.target.value);}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:()=>{props.addToDoList(inputText);setInputText('');},children:"Add"})]})]});}export default ToDoApp;
